headline: Fora Financial Appoints John Egerman as Chief Financial Officer
summary: Fora Financial, a leading provider of flexible financing solutions to small and medium-sized businesses nationwide, is pleased to announce the appointment of John Egerman as its new Chief Financial Officer. In his new role, Mr. Egerman will oversee the company's financial operations, strategy, investor relations, capital development, and risk management.
